name: A House of Thieves (itch)
description:
A House of Thieves is a level-based stealth comedy-horror game about a Thief who doesn't go shopping but instead takes his shopping list and breaks into random houses to get his things.

Note: This game supports local multiplayer (same router/network). When two or more players/computers are not connected to the same network: You can fake local multiplayer by using proxy services (like LogMein Hamachi). Or buy the game on Steam that supports online multiplayer. Or just play single-player.

Imagine you want to cook some Pasta but you run out of Tomato Sauce. You are also not the kind of person who goes to a supermarket and pays for their groceries. What do you do?
Correct! Break into your neighbor's house and work through your shopping list!

PC version (mouse and keyboard) of the popular indie VR game There is a Thief in my House.

Excellent replayability
  • Each item on your list is chosen at random
  • Items change their location every time you repeat a level
  • AI randomly walks around the house
  • 15+ different levels in different locations (houses, school, farm, construction site, gas station,...)
Unlockable gadgets
  • The faster you finish a level, the more stars you get
  • Reach certain numbers of stars to unlock gadgets
Multiplayer
  • Up to 4 players against an AI or 3 players against another player
  • Play as the homeowner and place traps to stop your opponents

Note: This game supports local multiplayer (same router/network). When two or more players/computers are not connected to the same network: You can fake local multiplayer by using proxy services (like LogMein Hamachi). Or buy the game on Steam that supports online multiplayer. Or just play single-player.


Localized 
  • Complete game: English, German, French, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese from Brazil
  • Part of the game (only list): Russian, Korean
(Easter) Level Editor Mode

You can hide 9 eggs in various levels and create a key (a text string of letters and numbers) that you can share with your friends, who can then play your level and find your 9 hidden eggs.

Accessibility
  • Enable subtitles (for the deaf/hard of hearing)

System Requirements:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: 2 Cores @ 3GHz (i5-4690/Ryzen 3 3200G)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1050-Ti/AMD R9 380
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Only 4.3 GB to download, 12.3 GB on disk.
  • Mouse&Keyboard or Controller
  • Note: Choose your maximum frame rate (fps) in the game settings or your graphics card will do 100% to achieve the highest possible frame rate.
  • This game and the Demo need Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable 2019 (2017 & 2015) to work without crashes. Most PCs already have it installed.
